entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. Temperature falling to minus 8 this morning then rising.
entry.summary: Sunny. Local blowing snow this morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 early this morning. Temperature falling to minus 8 this morning then rising. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
